title: Boutique Oceanfront Puducherry Stay with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description: Nestled in the charming French Quarter of Puducherry, overlooking the Bay of Bengal, The Promenade promises a holiday experience like no other in one of India's favourite beach towns. Situated just minutes from famous Rock Beach, this modern hotel in 'India's French Riviera' is surrounded by colonial attractions, quaint caf√©s and lush gardens on all sides. Boasting four fabulous onsite dining options - considered some of the best in the town - this contemporary hotel also features a unique Balinese-themed lounge pool and a vibrant spa. It's time to switch off and rediscover serenity in this grand beachside hotel.
